Spiders in Choco
================

load WKT string defining Choco, note this may not be very precise

```{r}
wkt <- readLines(system.file("examples", "choco.txt", package = "spplit"))
```

xxxx

```{r}
# FIXME: need to also allow specify taxonomic query
res <- sp_occ(geometry = wkt, limit = 1000)
res %>% sp_list()
x <- res %>% sp_list() %>% sp_bhl_meta()
ocred <- x[1:10] %>% sp_bhl_ocr
ocred %>% sp_bhl_save()
#' #res %>% sp_list() %>% sp_bhl_meta() %>% sp_bhl_ocr %>% sp_bhl_save()
```

```{r}
library("httr")
res <- sp_occ(geometry = wkt, limit = 100, idig_args = c(class = 'arachnida'))
```
